message: If House Democrats don’t accept the bill to end government shutdown, they will be remembered as traitors.
Happy Veterans Day! Let’s honor our veterans with the maximum honor for their service!
Of course, after the election of Mamdani in NYC, immediately the Governor of New York says that she cannot give him money for free public buses. It was all a dirty scam on all New Yorkers!
At least there are some Democrats who love their country. Shame on the others!

Welcome to my official feed — From the Desk of Hristo. I made this site because on X I am constantly censored and silenced. This is my beta replacement — my personal space to speak freely. Here, I will comment on political news, share my thoughts, and keep you up to date. I will make this site even bigger and better in the future. Stay tuned — only the truth, straight from me! HNT
Working on something big. Stay tuned.
